text: This is the 6th rug I have ordered and received from this collection.  The smaller ones I got for the hall and bedroom are a decent thickness so they're OK.  This one - not so much.  It is so thin that it is like they spray painted a design on top of the rubber which is the backing.  Had I known it was going to be a different thickness than the other ones, I never would have bought it.  Even at $120, I feel ripped off and not sure if it will go back.  Not happy at all with it.  On the plus side, the pattern is pretty.

I am so glad we got only a 2 pack of this soap!  We found it very drying and just did not work for us.  We used it as a shower soap and after that were glad we didn't attempt to use it on our face.  Way too harsh for our sensitive, dry skin.  What was also interesting was the film it left on the shower wall which had to be what was left on our skin as well.  Plus, it totally stripped our skin of any natural oils which is never a good thing.  We'll just stick to our Nivea moisturizing body wash.

This is an excellent food and I loved serving it to Emma.  However, I tried on 2 separate occasions to give it to her from 2 different cases and we got a bad skin reaction both times.  I was puzzled to say the least because she enjoys several other flavors of Weruva without problems.  I stopped giving her this and continued on with the other flavors she loves which were mostly chicken breast varieties.  Then I tried the double dip flavor and we got the same reaction.  I had to figure this out!  I stopped giving her that one too and knew it couldn't be the beef because she loves the steak frites without any problems.  I finally compared the label to the other chicken flavors and the mystery was solved.  She seems to be allergic the the dark meat chicken in this food.  Since I have stopped giving her this and the double dip, we haven't any skin reactions again.  I still give it 5 stars because I know that most cats are not like my little hot house orchid.  An excellent food from a company I trust.

We just got the 9x12 sage/ivory rug today and are both extremely pleased.  It is a beautiful rug and within hours was laying flat and looking gorgeous.  It covers the area in our living room we wanted it to and makes it look more than a little elegant.  We found the colors to be accurate and didn't find any excessive odors at all.  Totally pleased.  I just ordered the matching runner for the hall! We find this rug plush and nicely weighted to stay in place on our hardwood floor.  It is also perfectly square on the ends and matched the wood slats on our floor which is wonderful!  These prices are unbeatable for this quality rug.UPDATE: 8-14 We had ordered the runner to match this rug and it came yesterday.  When we went to put it in the hall, we noticed the corners were frayed.  I do not feel like worrying about it being a continuous battle to keep it together so it is going back.  The sad part is that when we looked at the 9x13' rug, the corners are fraying on it too.  One is worse than the other 2 and one is somewhere in the middle but none of them look secure.  I am puzzled as to what to do with it at this point. I can't believe we missed seeing that when we put it down.  I guess because it is basically in the corners of the room, we didn't notice.  I really don't want to have to hassle with sending this big, heavy thing back but I don't want to have this problem with it either.  Not sure what we will do.  Has anyone else had this with theirs???

Disappointed with the larger size cans of this food.  I have been using the small cans with great success with my baby, Emma, without any problems.  I thought I would try to save some money by getting 2 servings out of one can for a better deal.  NOT.  When I opened the can, all I could see was broth.  I had to dig through to get even one serving of meat.  Looks like they used the same amount of meat as the 3 ounce cans and just added more liquid.  Will not be getting this size again.

We usually drink high test coffee.  Still, it is nice to have some decaf on hand for those times later in the day when you feel like  a cup of good coffee.  Other decafs tasted washed out to us and weak which we didn't care for.  This one meets our criteria with full body and a great price.  It is our go-to decaf on the coffee shelf.
Works great and does the job better than our previous one did.  Very happy with purchase.
Don't like the shape of these puzzle pieces.  Very boxy.  Even after putting the border together I found myself avoiding it.  Put it away and boxed it back up to donate to Goodwill.
Simple and easy afternoon or evening snack.  Not too salty and pops up nice and fluffy.  Ordered more.

I was a little afraid to try another new coffee because it seems like lately I have been striking out.  Anyway, am SO glad we gave this a try.  My husband and I are both very particular about just about everything and our coffee is not an exception.  This tastes like something you would be served in one of the finest coffee shops around.  Incredibly full and flavorful without ANY bitterness.  Just full and round.  Starts out creamy and ends with a nice tangy finish.  Wonderful!  Just ordered some on S&S of this one and the midtown as well.  We have found our new morning java.  If you are looking for a coffee such as I have described, look no further.UPDATE: As we loved the swingin bold, we decided to try the midtown and decaf as well.  Midtown was a kind of boring coffee with not much going on for us.  The decaf was the worst coffee we have tried just about anywhere.  It was like a bitter cup of hot water with no coffee flavor to balance it.  Threw the whole box out...it was that bad.

They are just as pleased.My review is the same for all of the recent Rosenberg books.Sorry to be redundant in my reviews, but seriously, they are all great.

Actually I love them. Except for the one sock where the toe seam came apart after wearing them twice. Otherwise they are what I have looked for and could not find anywhere. The other pairs are fine and I don't want to go through the trouble of returning/replacing all 4 pair for one sock. Although I would really like to have 4 complete pair.The expected delivery date was disappointing. But the actual delivery date was awesome. It came much quicker than stated.The non stick at the bottom does not take away from the feel of the sock. It is really not noticeable when walking other than not slipping on hard wood floors.I know their yoga socks, but I don't yoga.

This will be the same review as the 11", extension set, 17" etc...Where have these been all my life????I love to do small hand quilting work and Embroidery. I have always used those round, oval frames wondering why there wasn't a square one that would not smoosh my already finished work as I moved it around to continue.Then I saw these.Yes, I was skeptical. Very Skeptical.Now I have the 11", 8", 17" and extension kit. That pretty much gives me any size I need. You can mix the 8 or 11 or 17 to make a rectangle if need be.No turning, re-stretching the project.The frame comes apart easily when you want to put it away for storage. It does not come apart easily when working on a project.Now what will I do with all those round/oval frames?

I didn't need 10. But, just try finding 1. Where have all of these gone? They use to be everywhere. Tupperware peelers were always in my house, my grandma's house, my mom's house and my friend's house.I have had to start over with nothing. Thus finding this was wonderful.Ok, so finally I have found them.Just score with the hook end and get the peel started with the flat end. easy

It gives an elegant look to my floor. There is a member of this household who rarely notices anything. (some of you can relate to this I'm sure) First thing in the door was "WOW! That really looks nice. It makes a difference." That in itself is a great endorsement.The top is metal. The adjustable grating just under the "scroll" top is plastic. I do not have a problem with this. I can't see how this would be a problem unless a high heel stepped on it while the vent was closed. If that happened it wouldn't matter if it was plastic or metal the heel would be broken and someone might very well have a twisted ankle. We women are smart enough to step over.I do walk on it with bare feet, sandals, and tennis shoes. No problem. Even the bigger foot in the house walks on it. I have a vent that sits smack dab in the middle of the floor between to open rooms. The others are next to walls.
SMALL. Think small uses and these are great. When You have a tiny item to give and do not want to wrap, but still look nice then this is the bag for you.

I wanted to store some food items for longer periods of time. I would suggest purchasing and using the little bags of desiccant.These will NOT seal in a food saver. You must use a hot iron. Great for tea, since tea leaves don't like light.

I buy in bulk but there are only 2 of us. I separate items into appropriate amounts and seal away. I also seal dried fruits and jerky.Examples of use:breads, muffins etc.. (just remember to pulse seal or you'll have airless, flat, hard bread.meat  - both cooked and uncookedfruit to freeze for smoothiesrice, sugar, flour etc.

I use to use paper towels constantly to dry off my hands. I have no idea why I want to "save" the dish towel. Then I use the paper towel to wipe things down.Handi wipes however, get multiple uses. I can wipe my hands, wipe off the counters, let it dry over the faucet over night and use it again. I have not counted how many uses I can get compared to paper towels. I can say I hardly use paper towels anymore. When I do it's for things like broken eggs picking up stuff I want to throw away anyway.

Cheap. Very disappointed. The whirling spray only moves when there is a lot of water pressure. With a lot of pressure it covers a larger area than I would like it to.To water a smaller area these will not work.

I read the reviews of the Bali I purchased without the lace and some stated they liked these better. So, I thought I'd give them a try. They do fit well and they are comfortable they are just not my cup of tea. The lace bothers me at times as it can roll with my jeans.Maybe that's just a me feature. I'm very tomboyish when I work outside.

I go through hoses fast. They are kept outside all year long. over a hundred in the summer and at freezing in the winter. They are also kept out in the sun. If a hose last me over a year I'm good. If it last 2 I'm impressed.I'm impressed with this one. For whatever reason this is holding up as good if not better than my more expensive one.

No difference after 2 bottles. Yes the person this was purchased for has a bad case of fungus. But, we saw no difference.Did decide to try laser treatments. Some people cannot take the prescription drug for this as it is bad on the liver. So laser seamed a good choice. We're seeing progress.

It's a love hate relationship in this house. I hate this style of nozzle. BUT, another member LOVES it.So,If you like this style of nozzle I take it on good authority this is a good one.If you don't like this style then why are you looking here?  ;)

The handle and the brush do separate. I was hoping and reading reviews on many of these type of brushes to find a sturdy one that didn't just fall off.Nope - this one falls off. One reviewer suggested hot glue. I tried that. It worked for a week. So, Nice concept. But if you want a sturdy long handle don't buy this one.Look for one that says solid.I want a single, one piece handle. If you find one let me know.

I keep many things in buckets. chicken food, dog food flour etc... But, I have a very hard time opening them once sealed correctly. My finger tips and finger nails took a beating. Then this lovely tool found it's way into my Amazon basket and voil√° I can now open buckets with ease!

This is the best price. I have gone to the big box stores and cannot find these cheaper. As to their ability to "clean" they do keep the bowl below the water line clean. It's is good to know that I have hard water.Although I am rethinking this whole idea. If the toilets are cleaned often I may find I don't need these. We'll see.

It is nice to have a "spare" filter. The first time the original filter was washed it took 2 days to dry. That doesn't work for someone who vacuums every day. (animals, children, work boots) Besides, leaving it outside overnight doesn't appeal to me either.I held off buying a second set of filters due to the expense. That was a mistake. Having 2 sets is wonderful. I clean them more often as one set can completely dry while I dirty up the other. Due to allergies I wash / rinse these once a month. Probably excessive. They fit just like the original and I am a happy.I also bought  GENUINE Dyson DC-25 Lifetime Washable & Reusable HEPA Filter dc25

I am surprised at how strong this is. I was worried the top would cave in underneath my cat who likes to lay on top of it. No need to worry anymore.I did purchase a foam pet bed for the bottom. I bought a cheap one at a discount store, took off the cover and cut it to size. This carrier is not a standard easy to find size for cushions.My only complaint is the zipper. There are no problems with the zipper. It works just fine. However, the front zips UP! There are velcro tabs on the netting to hold it up when you roll up the "door." I would have preferred it to open from the top down.

Almost exactly like the original. The difference being you must push the side tabs to release it from your phone. No biggie. For the price difference I am happy. It does have the Verizon logo so I am guessing this charger to be an older design for i/pad - i/phones. When I purchased my phone the charger did not have the side release buttons to remove it from the phone.I have 2 vehicles and forget to take the charger from one to the other. This solved that problem.
I sometimes use this under the Neutrogena day time wrinkle moisturizer. Read my review for that item.Neutrogena is compatible with my skin.

It serves its purpose. Be aware these are thing glass. The hold up well to the flame, but I'd be extra careful with storage. The size is accurate and fits the standard lantern. It will not fit over a standard light bulb if you are using a light such as that.

I did not buy these to use as key rings. I bought them to use in my yard.I have several faucets, water hoses, sprinklers etc...I am forgetful!So, I place one of these on every faucet, hose, etc. When I turn them on I put the corresponding band on my wrist. Eventually I will feel or see it and remember that I have water on and need to turn it off.One new feature. I know have one next to my gas stove. Did I mention I'm forgetful? I have a tendency to walk into another room and then well.... out of sight

I love the contrasting colors, which is why I wanted this ring. However I was not thinking about height. The stones stand high above your finger. So, this would be a go out to dinner, party, whatever ring not a daily ring. I like to wear my rings all day. This one would/does get caught on things.As long as you are aware of that then you will be fine.I purchased Ring Guard by RING NOODLE (SET OF THREE 1-narrow, 1-medium, 1-wide) Ring... and placed the wide one on it. Since it's silver and the sizes are set without fractions this worked well.
Works great with tens 7000 unit. Best pads ever...get lots and lots of uses out of them.

I bought 3! One for my car, one for my home and one for my father.  At this price - do NOT SETTLE FOR BEING IN PAIN!No need! Easy to apply and use.  This is better than the other ones and the pads can be bought much cheaper than theother ones.  So many modes and choices.  Stays on for as long as you like up to an hour.  Fantastic.  Changes my whole day!
Just yellow paper with sticky stuff on it.  Works well but it's really LOW TECH...no smell...easy to use.
Bought for my friend (honest!).  She says it works well. No smell. No mess. No fuss. Portable.

Bigger than I thought (for some reason).... very thick plastic / love how clearit is.  Quality made / will not fall apart easily.  I added a zipper extention to thezipper because it seemed to disappear into the top of the bag  and was hard to locate.(google "zippermend".  Closes completely and securely. The opening is sunken about1" lower than the top of the bag that you can see here. The straps are cloth, about 1"wide and just long enough - like a shoulderbag/are not adjustable.  The bottom isflat and 3 inches wide which is the best part of the bag - bag stands up by itself andis roomy.  If your concerned about privacy don't get this bag!  If you want a mediumweight bag (it's not super light weight) that you can see through and holds a ton of stuffthis is your new favorite bag.

Very sturdy bag. Great for over the head headphones if you want to protect them in your purse (why I bought them).Love the color choices.  Good zipper.  I'm pleased.This is envelope style without a flat bottom. Plastic ismoderately heavy and not thin. Very clear.
Good brands and reliable product. No garlic breath as far as my friends can tell.

Okay. Go buy brown chalk. Take a big hunk off of it and chew it up.That's what these taste like. Maybe if hidden in sugary cookie batteryou can get away with that taste, but can't use them in gorp mix oreat on their own.  I knew these were not sweetened but carob hasit's own sweet taste / well most does - but these do not.  Happychalk munching!  I melted them, added sugar and made brownies withthem.  Will not order more.

Almost perfect.  I reinforced the wire that holds my Apple Ipad 2 (yes it fits) and I crazy glued thewire extentions into the exact width needed... I also added more rubberized grip material to the ends.Took a bit of fussing, but now it's perfect.  I'd like it to be wider from front to back... have a movableand more study wire behind my ipad 2, and have a "lock" feature on the extention wiring part - but hey,it's almost perfect. It';s very heavy so it's solid and not easily pushed or flipped while using.  It wasthe ONLY one with the grippers on the ends of the extention wires and the ONLY one that would fitmy Ipad air 2 and that's why I ordered it.  I did what I could to make it my own, more stable and ano risk of ipad falling off / must do's now it's okay.  Be creative. You can make it better if you needit to be...but it's pretty nice as is.

Delicious. I'm addicted.  I combine these with almonds and cashews for a very healthy small snack on the go.No caffeine and no dairy, no soy.  Carob is good for stopping diahhrea, IBS and has fiber. Lots of antioxidants incarob. Wish has a bit less sugar though/ They are very sweet / so I don't need more than a tiny bit of them with the nuts.Therefore not HIGH sugar for my snack.  So great.

They don't stick all that well.  You can get them to stick but even so, they can't hold much weight other than a piece of paper.  That's not all bad - it that's what you need.  The clips are strong and work well / they donot easily detach from the plastic.  Just takes a few tries to get them to stick to glass or tile or other smoothsurfaces. Arrived very quickly.

Gorgeous!  Excellent quality.  The switch is way down the cord (you should know that.VERY well packaged and came in perfect shape. Great for a bedside night table witha 25 watt bulb (but it can take a 40  watt bulb...).  LOVE IT. Bought 2!

I really liked how this looked like a cel phone and could be clipped to my pants.  I can wear it anywhere andI don't get any stares or questions about what it is.  A real life safer when it comes to lessening my lowerback pain. Easy to use and understand. I'm not all that mechanical ha ha.
You know this brand and you know you can't go wrong with it.  Very nice quality of product.
Very helpful, learned a lot.

Love this. Ordered Two!  Holds my DELL Latitude E5430 Notebook Computer ----Intel Core i5 3210M ------ just fine.I use it at the second lowest setting for eye - level work. Has spared me numerous headaches....so grateful.  It's not lightweight but it's very well made and I'm glad it's black. The computer doesnot slide off.  I"m so glad I bought it. I wish they would make a black plastic version that doesfold flat...this does not but oh well. Seems to heavy to drag around places so I just use it at home.
Just wanted ONE jar....that's hard to find! Found it!  Arrived unbroken and perfect!
Came quickly for my HP 8100 printer. Perfect.

A little tippy.  You have to winde the tree into the base and when you finally get it securely wound and tight enoughnot to wobble it's no longer properly aligned with the base. Still it's pretty and functional.
Smaller than expected but work just fine with all my french hook earrings.
I don't know if these help my arthritis pain or not --- but at least I'm giving it a go. Very expensive...

I love this suit.  It makes me feel like I'm on the USA Olympic Team at the pool and other peopleshould let me have a whole lane to myself!  Ha ha and they usually do! I'm 5'4" tall, 125 very athleticpounds, body fat 18% / do NOT have a big bum (you can't with this suit) and am a 34b / any biggeron top and this suit won't support you. I love the fact that it is lined in black so nothing uptop or belowis visible if you know what I mean.  Feels like a second skin and doesn't drag in the water while doinglaps. Did NOT like this...looks like dirty poo colored gel and is VERY sticky once on...no smell - butnot much help either. Topricin is much much better in so many ways...
Happy with this product. Helps with aches and pains.  Love the large size!  Expensive but worth it.

Oh, I didn't think this would be that great, but it is.  Hard to describe, it's a very "wet" kind of lotion...butgoes on very smoothly. I use it now as a moisturizer!  Great for any aches and pains.  Good for myhips/ arthritis... nice to use for massage and mixes with almond (carrier oil) very well.  Wish I'd found itsooner.: ) Happy camper here.

Nice belt. No problems.  Runs 1 size small.

It's a little large for the gym, but I use it there anyway ---- the green is great inside ./ can see everything so clearly.I cut off the outside straps that go across / I mean if it's so heavy I need to roll it I'm not going to be picking it 'up with those straps anyway. Great but I'm off whey for now...any milk protein seems to flare my arthritis terribly.
Nothing wrong with it, just decided it wasn't really my style.
Nice starter book.
Great. Helps in breaking up scar tissue....
Very nice but the print was too small for my 50 year old eyes!
Returned it.  Just decided this type of therapy was too much like cooking and I hate cooking. Book would be nicefor those interested in "recipes" and eye-droppers.
Had NO yellow in it at all.  Was strangely bright and artificial looking.  I returned it.
Wish it was a tad smaller... and I bought the compact one (I have small hands)... nice and smooth - the mouse responds well. The gel is comfy.
Very nice aromatherapy cheat sheet.  Wish it was bigger.
I order this all the time and put it in my oatmeal ---- to make SUPER good for me oatmeal!
Father is size 38 waist.  Fit him well...helps him shower with his homecare while preserving his modesty.  Very very soft!Love the blue!

Lost one start for REALLY STINKY but hey, that smell went away within a few days.  NO grommets on mine.Crystal clear and nice and LONG/large.  Nicely reinforced holes at the top. Will probably last forever.
Great product, no surprises.
I bought several. Very easy to put together and slip proof.  Excellent!
Great product.
Very hard seat and very hard to take apart when returning. No problem with return.  Rolls smoothly but wasn't low enough for me.
A nice shortcut to Aromatherapy!  Wish I could get it larger!

Surviving for US is the debut novel from Lauren Nicole. This is a beautiful love story about taking chances and opening your heart up to love again.Angie was hurt badly by her high school sweetheart and she doesn‚Äôt think she‚Äôll be able to fall in love or trust again. All that changed when she met Chase through a mutual friend. Chase is beyond gorgeous and sweet. Chase was drawn to Angie immediately recognizing her as his neighbor when he was in high school. He could tell he had his work cut out for him for her to even allow him in as a friend. Having a girlfriend would be hard for him since he is leaving to go back to school for his military training as a Marine. Soon Angie and Chase are unable to fight the feelings they have for each other and they become so much more. Leaving her was painful and harder than he expected. Chase and Angie have so much love, but will that be enough for their relationship to survive the challenges it faces?I loved this book because of all the ‚Äúfeels‚Äù it evokes. I laughed and cried right along with the characters. I loved the secondary characters, Jenn and Chris, as much as I did Angie and Chase. I can‚Äôt wait to see what else Lauren has in store for us!

Wow! Wow! Wow! What a fantastic book! I was all consumed when I read this book. Once you start just plan on reading until you are done. Once you finish, you'll want more.I immediately admired Alexandria Charles Montague Collins for her determination to make herself and not be held prisoner to her family name. There's so much to say about the crazy that is her family that you'll just have to read it for yourself. When Alex get summoned home right before heading to New York for law school it's like coming back to her worst nightmare. You will be pissed for her!This story alternates between six weeks ago and the present. Six weeks ago Alex went on vacation with her best friend where she decides to become someone else. She wants to let go of all the stress and burden of being Alexandria. She becomes "Charli" who she sees as the opposite of herself. Charli is fun and carefree. Charli  meets a mysterious, handsome stranger, Nox, who she agreed to be with for a week. Their week together is smoking hot!! They made rules to not share any personal information and after the week, it's over. The heart doesn't always get the memo.Fast forward 6 weeks and Alex is faced with life changing decisions. Will breaking free from her family bring her freedom or only cause her to betray herself even more?Betrayal is hot, sexy and intriguing! You will be begging for more. This is definitely a 5 star read for me!

Slaying the Dragon is the second book and the conclusion to the Deception Duet. Let me tell you this was rightly named the Deception Duet because this book keeps you glued to the pages wondering just who is deceiving who. From page-one my heart began to race and my blood pressure was rising with all that begins to unfold for Mackenzie and Tyler.Slaying the Dragon is filled with so much emotion and tension, both sexual and otherwise. What's great about this duet is that not only do you feel Tyler and McKenzie but you feel the secondary characters as well. All your questions will be answered and you will definitely be surprised at some of the answers.I could not put this book down and was sad to see it end. This is a definite five star must read!!!

The Way We Fall is the first book in the Story of Us series. It was such an emotional book.  I fell in love with this book from page one and could not stop reading. The characters were real, raw and emotional.  This isn't a feel good mushy hearts and flowers romance.  Yes there is love and romance, but there is also pain and tragedy.  Be ready to face some emotionally charged topics that you will feel with all your heart.  Hours after finishing this book I am still trying to absorb all that happened.The Way We Break is the second book in the Story of Us series. I don't even know what to say other than I am completely blown away with this book.  Thinking about this story has tears in my eyes as I write this review.  The emotions are so real and so raw.  So many questions are answered and we see just how much both love and lies can tear people apart and bring others together. It has never been more clear to me how much Houston loves Rory, as you will see, when he pulls out all the stops to bring her happiness and gain her forgiveness. The end of this book left me wondering how much more can any one person take.  I anxiously await the final book, The Way We Rise.  Cassia Leo never fails to deliver.The Way We Rise is the final book in the Story of Us series. I could not have asked for a more perfect ending to Houston and Rory's story. I have to say that my heart almost stopped several times while reading this book. I cried tears of sadness and tears of joy. This is an emotional ride that will stay with me for a long time.What I loved about this book is that you can feel the heart and soul of each of the characters. Houston proves that he is a man among men and does everything in his power to prove his love to Rory, even when what he has to do wasn't what I wanted at the time.Rory was so lost and hurt that she didn't know which way was up. Her struggle to find herself, forgive herself, Houston, her father, and Hallie tore at my heart. Her relationship with Kenny, her best friend, it's one that anyone would be lucky to have.There's so much I want to say but I don't want to give any spoilers. The Way We Rise is a must read that you're sure to love!

Madame X absolute blew me away.  It was everything I thought it would be but then again not what I expected.  This story will bind you to the pages and keep you reading until you finish.  My heart was broken for Madame X and all that she has endured and lost. What would you do if you had no memory of your past, not even your name.  Madame X on the outside appears to have it all.  She lives in a luxury condo that is more like a prison.  She works for Caleb, teaching the spoiled and privileged rich boys how to become respected men.  No she isn‚Äôt a call girl and doesn‚Äôt have sex with these men.  Caleb would never allow it.  He tells her over and over ‚ÄúYou belong to me.‚Äù Caleb found and saved her on that fateful day 6 years ago and she is loyal to him. He takes what he wants and she gives it to him. There are so many facets to this story that I don‚Äôt even know where to begin or what to say.  Along comes Logan who completely takes Madame X by surprise and she has unexpected feelings for him. Fear keeps her from completely giving in to the feelings that were evoked just by the sight of Logan. This book is full of many twists and turns, some of which I did not see coming.  I think there is so much more to all the characters in this story and I cannot wait to discover each and every thing that is to come.

Both of Her was just WOW! I was expecting to be blown away and blown away I was. This book was intense and will keep you glued to the pages.Luca was only 18 when her life was forever changed after being snowed in at the airport and meeting a drop dead gorgeous pilot . The weekend they were together he taught her what pleasure was and gave her the taste of the finer things. For years she has longed for this man. Now as it successful business owner, Luca lives two lives. She is CEO Luca by day and Lucia over the weekend where she is becomes a call girl so she can get the pleasure and luxuries she craves. Your mind is going to be blown when her past and present collide  and her two worlds become one.This book is scorching hot! If you love the book filled with hot men, sex and suspense then this is the book for you! This was definitely a five-star read for me!

I did a little happy dance when I read this book.  I fell in love with Adam when he was with Claire, but I loved Chris too and I knew it wasn't meant to be for Adam and Claire.  I was so happy to get to find out what happened in Adam's life and to see his HEA. Ripped is Adam and Lindsey's story.  This book was beyond funny, sexy and full of love.  So many times I had tears in my eyes from laughing and overall emotion. There are so many quotes and jokes I highlighted in this book that I had to read to my husband. I will admit that I was not a fan of Lindsey in the early books, but she definitely redeemed herself in my eyes. She is a strong and loving wife and mother. There were so many life lessons in this book that will make you love them all even more. This is a must read for all fans of the Shattered Hearts Series!

Life Before Damaged volume 9 was everything and more! I couldn't be more in love with Peter than I am right now. You are going to be totally blown away and shocked at the things you find out in this book. Wow! It's all I can say I'm stunned with what happens! I could say so much but I don't want to give any spoilers away. Just trust me this book will blow you away. I am so sad that we know what's going to happen and that that time is coming soon.

The Seduction of Alex Parker is a book that I could not put down. I absolutely love everything Sani Lynn and this was no exception. If you love Connor and Ellery Black in the Forever Series, then you will love Alex Parker and Emerson James. This is a standalone novel.Alex Parker is the sexy as sin billionaire who had the world at his feet, but he was very arrogant and all about control. That control was soon hard to keep when his friend's sister came into his life. A favor for a friend changed him forever. This beautiful, defiant, sexy, sassy mouth girl gave him a run for his money.Emerson was always on the go never staying in one place too long. After the tragic death of her parents and twin sister, Emerson spent eight years on the go until she was forced to come home to California. Alex Parker opened his home to her but she wasn't sure if she could deal with his arrogant bossy ways. Only she wasn't able to control how he made her feel again.I loved the banter between Alex and Emerson. When they connect it is unbelievable. I wanted to scream at them because they are both so stubborn. I also love how they both were just what the other needed only they didn't know it. You will love all the sassy, fiery, tender and frustrating moments and will want more because it is just that perfect.

Sinful Desire is book 2 in the Sinful Nights series by Lauren Blakely. This book has it in spades! If you want a hot alpha male ‚Äì check! Submissive yet successful confident woman ‚Äì check! Explosion in the bedroom, wall, couch, table, car or whatever other surface you can think of, then- double check!!Ryan Sloan and Sophie Winston had an immediate attraction when they met outside the police precinct in Las Vegas. The pavement was melting the minute they spoke. Mr. dirty talking always  in control has no control over his feelings for Sophie. This successful wealthy woman was made to submit to him in the bedroom. I will never be able to look at or think of green ties and peaches the same again.So I have established that this has some hot and sexy, I need a cold shower scenes, but it also has tender moments and a captivating story line that keeps you turning the pages. This book is the continuation of the Sloan family's tragic past and the aftermath of their father's murder. Ryan wants to believe that his mom isn't  responsible for his father's murder and has stood by her for 18 years. The investigation is reopened and there seems to be more questions than answers. Hold on to your hat because the drama and mystery only gets bigger with the bombshell that is dropped at the end of this book. I definitely need Sinful Longing now to see how this plays out. Not to mention another hot Sloan brother!

Keep Me is the third and final book in the Shelter Me series by Kathy Coopmans. This is Antonio and Shelby's story. You are first introduced to these two in the previous books. I loved both Shelby and Antonio. You quickly learn with Antonio that you can't judge a book by its cover. Antonio was the entire package and Shelby quickly learned that she was so wrong in her judgment of him. You will love the chemistry and playful banter between these two. They found a way to make everything they do together exciting. I love this entire series and I'm sad to see it end.

Complicate Me was a book full of love, angst, and heartache that kept me glued to the pages. It is a story of two childhood best friends who both love and break each other. You will witness firsthand their journey to adulthood and all the wrong turns they take along the way that lead them back home. I cried ugly tears but loved every minute of it!

After reading Perfectly Equipped, the prequel to Perfectly Seduced, I was more than ready to dive into this book. April and Sean had chemistry that was off the chart and a connection that seemed too good to be true. April opened up her heart a little in Hawaii only to be disappointed when so much time passed without hearing from Sean. Well imagine her surprise when Sean turned out to be her son's teacher. She quickly figured out that he was keeping secrets and wasn't who he said he was. Then again, she had secrets of her own. Even knowing he was keeping things from her she couldn't stay away and quickly fell for him all over again. For Sean his job turned out to be more than a job and he put everything on the line for April.  This story is one of mystery, suspense and romance. There are a lot of twists and turns in this action filled romance that will keep you glued to the pages.

I absolutely loved Drowning to Breathe. This is the conclusion to Shea and Sebastian's story that began in A Stone in the Sea. The love and pain can be felt pouring from the pages. Get tissues ready because I had tears pouring down my face as I finish this book. It was such a beautiful love story. The ending couldn't have been more perfect and it was so much more than I expected. AL Jackson takes us on a journey of heartache, love and devotion that will stay with you for a long time!

Contrite: This book was unlike anything I have ever read. Contrite absolutely blew me away. Once I started reading I could not put it down. Kathy was a master storyteller who pulled me in and has left me speechless. There are many twists, turns and shocking moments that will leave you reeling. My thoughts when I finish this book were OMG! WTF! Did that really just happen? I'm still waiting for my heart rate to go back to normal after reading this book. It blew 5 stars out of the water!REPRISAL: I absolutely loved this series. I was so floored at the ending of Contrite that I thought I was going to combust. Well.....the pressure continued to build throughout Reprisal. This book will absolutely blow you away. It is twisted beyond belief and will blow your mind. You will see the strength and determination that Clove has like no other. You will witness just what is possible with the power of love. This book has it all- drama, suspense, danger, hot sex and passion, and undying love. Reprisal was so unexpected and I loved every minute of it!

Finding Mr. Right will keep you laughing as you turn the pages. Maggie was so funny yet such a quirky dreamer that she often got herself in trouble with her unrealistic dreams. Bottom line is she just wanted to find love and her Mr. Right. Maggie's mishaps kept me laughing out loud.

OPULENCE: Opulence by Angelica Chase will blow you away. It was beyond hot! I had to take a break and fan myself several times while reading this book. Once you start reading this, you won't be able to put it down.You will immediately be pulled in to Nina's messed up life. She turned an idea into millions and became someone she didn't recognize. On her journey to the life of the rich, she met Devin McIntyre. This man enticed her like no other. She was helpless to his charm and sexuality. She craved him and fell hard for him, until her world fell out from under her and she found out that Devin wasn't who she believed. As much as she now despised him she couldn't stay away. She craved him like a drug.Determined to move on, Nina goes to a bar where she meets Aiden, the exact opposite of what she's used to. Aiden was a down to earth sexy as sin singer/bar owner. She was attracted to him and he made her feel beautiful. He dominated her and she loved it. She could see herself trying for "more" with him, if her addiction to Devin doesn't ruin it all. Devin wants what he can't have and continues to contact Nina.Opulence ends with an OMG bombshell that will leave your mouth open. I can't wait to see what happens next. I need Reverence now!REVERENCE: Things are getting intense! Just when I wanted to hate Devin, we see inside his head and see how much he cares for Nina. Flashbacks are throughout letting us see their relationship in the past and what he was really feeling.Aiden is just so swoon worthy and seems to really "see" Nina. Nina is torn in her feelings because she wants to be done with Devin but hates that she still wants him.What's going to happen when these two men come face-to-face? There are so many holy sh*t moments in this book. The book ends in an OMG cliffhanger. Angelica Chase is absolutely brilliant! I never know what's going to happen. It's never what I expect, but oh so much better. This is beyond five stars!!HINDRANCE: This book will totally rock your world!!! Angelica Chase is stinkin brilliant!!! OMG, I need time to process!!! I guarantee you'll be saying what I did. Omg, wtf, I didn't see that coming!!! This book and series blew 5 stars out of the water!

More than Famous is the continuation of Brook and Cade‚Äôs story and it just gets better and better.  I fell even more in love with Cade and Brook as I read.  It is hard to find a love as true as theirs. No matter what obstacles get in the way they are determined to be together.  And let me tell you it doesn‚Äôt get any easier in this book.  David and Wendy are up to no good as usual trying everything in their power to pull Brook and Cade apart. With another separation looming with both starting new movies, jealousy is an ugly beast that just might continue to pull them apart.  It is getting harder than ever to hide their love from the prying eyes of the paparazzi.  The heat and angst are at an all-time high in this book.  You can literally feel it rolling off the pages.  I am more than in love with this series, so if you haven‚Äôt read Famous, then do so quickly so you can dive into More than Famous and feel more of the heat and love!

Life Before Damaged Vol. 8 had my head and heart spinning!Poor Gina can't catch a break. She is happy with Philip but Constance makes sure that will not happen. With each installment I think how much more can this poor girl take? Peter sweeps in charming as ever, but I swear Peter's moods give me whiplash. When he is good, he's good, but then he becomes an ass and I want to scream!My anxiety level is rising because I'm anticipating what's to come for Gina. I really need to see Peter openly admit to Gina how he feels! Their chemistry is off the charts, if only they'd let it happen. I'm so ready for Life Before Damaged Vol. 9!!

Perfectly Equipped is a fun and quick read that gets your attention from page 1. If vacationing at a nudist resort in Hawaii doesn't get your attention, then I don't know what will.April isn't happy when she finds out her best friend Millie's idea of a vacation is at a nudist resort in Hawaii. It had been three years since April's husband died and Millie was determined to get April to hook up with someone. April falls asleep while sunbathing and she awakens to a naked man in all his glory in front of her offering sunscreen. Holy cow is this man hot and well endowed, not to mention cocky too.Later that day, April runs into Sean at the restaurant. They have immediate and explosive chemistry. Unfortunately their chemistry isn't the only thing exploding. After making an unbelievable connection a volcanic eruption causes them to be separated.Will April ever see the man who made her feel again after three years? I can't wait to read it Perfectly Seduced.

Code of Honor is the first book in the Spontaigo Family Series by Missy Johnson and I can't wait for more!!Pietro has been planning revenge his entire life after witnessing his mother and father being murdered when he was only 8 years old.  After his parent's death, Pietro went to live with Giovanni, his fathers friend, and his daughter Lucia.  Pietro was instantly drawn to Lucy and they were best of friends.  As they grew up, Pietro and Lucy both had feelings for each other, which they thought were unrequited. Pietro knows he can never act on this and disrespect Giovanni; however, when he is sent to "watch out" for Lucy when she moves away from home to pursue her dreams of becoming a dancer, Pietro learns that doing the honorable thing isn't always right or easy. Soon his past and present collide and nothing will be the same.If you like danger, suspense and passion that comes with being in the mafia, then this is the book for you. This book ends in a cliffhanger and I can not wait for more!!!

Emphatic was beyond fantastic. I was immediately pulled into the book and could feel each and every character in the story.Logan proved that she was tough and would no longer be the revolving door that her ex-boyfriend made her. Believing that happily ever after is a joke, she decided to put herself first for a change. Logan got her dream job after college and oh so much more than she bargained for. What she didn't expect was for her boss to be a smoking hot and sexy rock God. How will she resist this man?Kacen is more than just a sexy rockstar. He is the most amazing and loyal friend and son. He goes after what he wants with his heart and soul. Kacen isn't afraid to show his feelings. He is possessive and protective, sensitive, sweet and loving.I can't say enough how much I love this book. Kacen melted my heart and is one fabulous book boyfriend! This is a love story you won't be able to stop reading!

The Other Side is such a sweet novella about two best friends, Lillian and Jason, who have been inseparable since they were just four years old. Now they are graduating from college and going their separate ways.  They soon discover that leaving the other behind is harder than they expected.  Both are in denial that the other has "more than friends" feelings for the other that all their friends can see.  A graduation gift puts them together on a beach vacation for two weeks and so much happens.I loved this book.  I was rooting for Jason and Lillian the entire book.  If you want a quick read that will make you feel good, then this is a book for you.

I loved this book. Four Week Fianc√© was both funny and sexy and will keep you guessing what's going to happen next.Mila has been in love with TJ, her brother's best friend, since she was just a child. Now she is all grown up and is determined to make him notice her, even if it means trying to make him jealous. Only TJ turns the table on her in all kinds of unexpected ways.Get ready for some twists and turns and trying to figure out who is playing who. How far will Mila's love for TJ take her? Can she accept what he offers her? Will she even be able to handle what he offers her? I am so ready for the hot conclusion that is sure to come!

Love Lust and Liam melted my heart. There is nothing not to love about Liam Wyatt. He is a sexy millionaire who is tired of playing the field and just wants to find one woman who will love him for him. There are times when you will want to scream, laugh and cry. You will most definitely need a fan!Liam's world was tilted off it's axis when he met a woman at the gym who fascinated him with her quick wit and snarky attitude. Not to mention her beauty. He couldn't have been happier than when he found out that his "Gym girl" was one of Wyatt Enterprises new lawyers.Avery Lewis took her dream job in New York at a prestigious law firm. She was running from one bad relationship and heartbreak to another and this with her new start. With a wall firmly placed around her heart she was ready for a new start. She wasn't prepared for what was to come in the form of the sexy millionaire Liam Wyatt. He was the total package, only she refused to let him in for more than just sex. She wouldn't be able to recover if her heart was broken again.Will Liam be able to tear down the walls around Avery's heart or will she keep pushing him away? You have got to read this book and see just what happens. I honestly could not put this book down. It was hot, sexy, and beautiful. Plus you get a few peeks at many of the other characters you love from Sandi Lynn.

The Way We Rise is the final book in the Story of Us series. I could not have asked for a more perfect ending to Houston and Rory's story. I have to say that my heart almost stopped several times while reading this book. I cried tears of sadness and tears of joy. This is an emotional ride that will stay with me for a long time.What I loved about this book is that you can feel the heart and soul of each of the characters. Houston proves that he is a man among men and does everything in his power to prove his love to Rory, even when what he has to do wasn't what I wanted at the time.Rory was so lost and hurt that she didn't know which way was up. Her struggle to find herself, forgive herself, Houston, her father, and Hallie tore at my heart. Her relationship with Kenny, her best friend, it's one that anyone would be lucky to have.There's so much I want to say but I don't want to give any spoilers. The Way We Rise is a must read that you're sure to love!

I'd loved this book! If you're looking for hot and sexy, then look no more. Consumed By You will keep you reading late into the night.Travis and Cara are not new to the passion that draws them together. They had a fling their senior year in high school and into that summer before college. And that was something they both cannot forget.Travis has no intentions of falling in love and dealing with the pain that is sure to follow. Travis is one stubborn man and fights his feelings each time they start to pull him in. Cara has a life plan and wants to settle down and find Mr. Right, but she can't do that until she gets Travis out of her mind and out of her system.Travis hires Cara to train his precocious pup Henry. All she does is think about the past and how no man has ever lived up to Travis. She comes up with a plan to just "get him out of her system" by having no strings, no holes barred sex for the two weeks Cara is training Henry. After the 2 weeks, they will walk away. What happens over the two weeks will have you fanning yourself for sure. Both get more than they bargained for and her plan to "get him out of her system" isn't as easy as she thought.This is one sweet, sassy and sexy book that I could not put down!!

I cannot even believe how this book unfolds. It would be hard to go into too much detail without totally giving away spoilers. What I am going to say is OMG! OMG! OMG! You are not going to believe what happens in this book. I'll give you one little taste of what's to come. Mel is back and she is sassy as ever. You won't believe all the info you find out about in this book. I am jumping up and down clapping my hands. I love this installment! Bring on the Arrangement 21!!

I don't even know where to begin in writing this review. My heart starts to feel heavy and my emotions go all over the place. I think as a parent of a teenage son I cannot imagine him going through what Josh does and all he gives up to be the man and father every parent can be proud of. Josh is left to care for his infant son when his girlfriend leaves him and walks away from both him and Tommy. Josh is left with nowhere to go and he finds himself selling his prized skateboard to pay for diapers and formula for Tommy.Kindness from a stranger turns his life around.Josh has no time for dating but finds himself drawn to the sad green eyes of his landlady, Chazarae, granddaughter. Becca is broken and she has so many walls around her heart but sweet Tommy and Josh slowly tear them down. Unfortunately the past often comes back to the present and our world gets turned upside down.I absolutely loved this book. Just know that you will laugh, cry, scream and beg for some things to change, but in the end you will be so thankful he read this book! Kick Push will forever have a place in my heart.

What an amazing deal for 22 stories from 22 wonderful authors! I quickly devoured Perfectly Equipped by Lacey Silks.Perfectly Equipped is a fun and quick read that gets your attention from page 1. If vacationing at a nudist resort in Hawaii doesn't get your attention, then I don't know what will.April isn't happy when she finds out her best friend Millie's idea of a vacation is at a nudist resort in Hawaii. It had been three years since April's husband died and Millie was determined to get April to hook up with someone. April falls asleep  while sunbathing and she awakens to a naked man in all his glory in front of her offering sunscreen. Holy cow is this man hot and well endowed, not to mention cocky too.Later that day, April runs into Sean at the restaurant. They have immediate and explosive chemistry. Unfortunately their chemistry isn't the only thing exploding. After making an unbelievable connection a volcanic eruption causes them to be separated.Will April ever see the man who made her feel again after three years? I can't wait to read it Perfectly Seduced.

Words Left Unsaid will leave  you breathless.  My heart broke for Kiara and what she wen thru.  How do you go on living when the man you love, your fianc√© and father of your child is taken from you in a tragic accident, only he's not dead, but has been in a coma for 3 years.  Kiara longs to have Aiden come back to her and she has remained faithful to him.  Her family knowing she needs to move on for her own wellbeing as well as her daughters, trick her into a blind date.  She never expected to find a man like Max. As hard as she tries to push Max away, he stands true to her and is there to support her.  Will she ever be able to find her true happiness or will guilt and tragedy consume her?I loved this book! It was painful yet beautiful.  It is definitely a 5 star read for me!!

Promise To Marry: This is another amazing book by Jessica Wood! I have been so excited for months waiting to read Promise to Marry, and it was well worth the wait. This book has everything! Drama, sadness, pain, love, humor and hot sex!Chloe and Jackson were childhood best friends. I loved reading about their close friendship and bond that seemed to be unbreakable. They even made a pact that if either one was single when they were old, thirty, then they would marry each other.Chloe does the unthinkable when she is 19 and causes her one true friend to hate her. Now she finds herself 30 and alone. She hates herself for what she did to Jackson all those years ago. Will coming home for a friends wedding be what Chloe needs to put her feelings out there and let Jackson know how sorry she is, or will it just be too little too late?This book ends in one heck of a cliffhanger! It will leave you beyond speechless!!! I'm so ready for book two!!Promise To Keep: Promise to Keep is book 2 in the Promises series. It continues with Chloe and Jackson's story. In this book we see all the back history between these two and what led to the jaw dropping ending of Promise to Marry. I can promise you that you will both love and hate Jackson in this book. I definitely felt for both of them and I developed a soft spot for Chloe. Things are not always as black and white as they appear. Prepare yourself for another holy cow cliffhanger that will once again have you picking up your jaw from the floor. I am beyond excited to see where Jessica is going to take us in the final book!Promise of Forever: I couldn't have asked for a better ending to Chloe and Jackson's story in Promise of Forever. My heart was just breaking for them at the beginning of this book watching Jackson's anguish over Chloe's accident and Chloe's anguish over her discovery. I'm not going to give any spoilers, but be prepared to cry, laugh and love this book! I loved the first two books in the Promises Series, Promise to Marry and Promise to Keep, and Promise of Forever was no exception. This was a five-star read for me.

What a great start to the story of Mila and TJ.  My Fake Fianc√© is the prequel novella to Four Week Fianc√©. Mila has been in love with her brother's best friend for as long as she can remember. Now she is facing a weekend with him and blonde Barbie at the lake house.  Mila is going to try to prove to him that she is a woman and no longer a child.  No more seeing her as his best friends kid sister.  TJ has plans of his own and we just get a glimpse of what's to come.  The chemistry is crackling and it is only just beginning.  I can't wait to see what is in store for us in My Fake Fianc√©!

Unforgettable is the final book in the Beachwood Bay Series by Melody Grace.  This is Ash Callahan and Noelle Olsen's story.  We got a peek at how Ash and Noelle met in the novella Unmasked.  I fell in love with them then and even more so now!Ash and Noelle are both in Beachwood Bay and they are more than surprised when they see each other.  Ash thought he had put her behind him and Noelle was still stung from not hearing from him after their night together.  Ash will make your head spin with his hot/cold and on/off behavior towards Noelle, but what happens in the end is all that really matters.  You will swoon!!Noelle has totally fallen in love with Beachwood Bay and will stop at nothing to make her grandmother proud by keeping open the Rose Cottage B&B.  So many obstacles are throw her way, but Noelle wants to prove to herself and her family that she did not make a mistake.  Her feelings for Ash can't be denied even with all that happens.  Their chemistry is hot and explosive!I love that all our favorites from this series are in this book to bring us closure.  In the end we see just what this small community is made of and how it can affect everyone. Even those who seem to be hardened to feelings and letting others in.  I am so sad to see this series end, but this book was an amazing ending!

When Ash Callahan goes to a Charity gala the last thing he expects to do is fall for a beautiful damsel in distress. Ash is a workaholic real estate developer who has no time for anything but work. He only goes to this gala for networking.Noelle is a hard-working lawyer whose family thinks she's going to turn into an old maid because she is 26 with no boyfriend. Noelle finds herself going on another blind date set up by her friends. She doesn't want to go and to make matters worse, she she ends up getting her high heels stuck in a grate in the road just outside the charity gala.Ash arrives just in time to help Noelle. They both have electric chemistry. After helping her get free and one breathtaking kiss, Ash is left as Noel goes off to her blind date, which is an epic fail. All she can think about is the man that took her breath away with one kiss.This novella gives us a glance at how they meet. Will they come together again and experience more than a kiss? This is a must read and I'm ready for more!

21 Stolen Kisses by Lauren Blakely stole my heart. This is a beautiful and sweet forbidden romance between Noah and Kennedy. While there's only an eight year age difference they knew everyone else would think this was wrong. But how could something that fits together so perfectly be wrong? Kennedy is not like your typical 17-year-old. She is old before her time. Kennedy and Noah have so much in common they are just made for each other. Their love of musical theater brought them together.  Noah is one of the few people she can tell her feelings about her mother. Her mother has been cheating on her father and making her hide this ever since she was just a little girl. Kennedy finally told her father and their marriage dissolved. She's living with the guilt of having to keep all the secret of all the married men her mother has been with. Kennedy goes on a journey to try to right the wrong by sending love letter apologies to all the people her mother hurt. Finally wanting to get back at her mom and have her found out. Kennedy had to break off her relationship with Noah for fear of her  parents finding out and ruining his career. She just has a little time until she turns 18 and they can be together. Noah is madly in love with her and will do anything for her. You will melt at what a sweetheart he is and how much he loves her. But is that love enough? Kennedy begins to question everything in her life and this broke my heart. Throughout the book we get snippets of their 21 stolen kisses when they were together. I want those kisses! If you are looking for a book full of sex, then this book isn't for you. But, if you are looking for true love and romance then get ready to love this book! 5 amazing stars!!

I don't even know what to say other than I am completely blown away with this book.  Thinking about this story has tears in my eyes as I write this review.  The emotions are so real and so raw.  So many questions are answered and we see just how much both love and lies can tear people apart and bring others together. It has never been more clear to me how much Houston loves Rory, as you will see, when he pulls out all the stops to bring her happiness and gain her forgiveness. The end of this book left me wondering how much more can any one person take.  I anxiously await the final book, The Way We Rise.  Cassia Leo never fails to deliver.

I have to say that Three, Two, One was not at all what I expected, but it was so much more.  This is a love story that is unlike any I have ever read.  Be prepared to be shocked and heartbroken, yet have your heart put back together again.  This book has left me with on book hangover that I am sure will not go away any time soon.  My hat's off to JA Huss for this brilliant book!

Combative was not your typical book by Jay McLean, but it was just as amazing as all her books. Combative was a book I could not put down. Be prepared to feel all kinds of emotions in this book. I was shocked, pissed, full of sorrow and tears, and at other times I found myself laughing out loud.I immediately fell in love with Kyler (Ky) from page 1. You can't help but fall for this man who in spite of having the most horrendous of early childhood years, still has such a loving and giving nature, even though he doesn't see it in himself. He was dealt a s***ty hand and blames himself for things that were out of his control. Ky didn't have much to live for except revenge, until he met Madison. Madison is his  very beautiful and mysterious neighbor who harbors deep pain and secrets of her own. It seems that together these two can heal each other's hearts and trust. If only things were that simple. You're in for one heck of a bombshell cliffhanger at the end of this book. I am beyond ready for Redemptive to see just what is in store for them!

CROSSED: I loved Crossed by Lacey Silks. This is Grace and Hunter's story.Grace is Emma Cross' best friend. They both survived the loss of the love of their life in a tragic accident. Grace has been looking to find love and move on, but no one has fit the bill. That is until an unlikely "caveman" was brought into her salon by Emma. She was guilted to take this "charity case". She was shocked by what she discovered under all the hair and dirt.Hunter was working undercover to put away a crime family only to find himself drawn to the one person who  unknowingly is the key to it all. Hunter fell for Emma and now he is torn between doing his job and keeping Emma safe.Emma can't believe how perfect Hunter is and she thinks he is "the one". Once she discovers what a Hunter really does, will she be able to give him her heart?Crossed is full of danger, suspense and all kinds of hot chemistry between Hunter and Emma. I loved every minute of this book!LAYERS CROSSED:Layers Crossed by Lacey Silks will grab you and pull you in right away. I could not put this book down. This book is full of romance, hot sex, secrets and danger that come together for one hell of a story.Slight spoilers in this review.Emma cross is a private investigator who works with her overprotective, overbearing brothers. She has suffered tragedy losing the only man she had ever loved two years ago in a tragic accident. She blames herself and has been stuck in a funk ever since. Her overprotective brothers have kept her on cases that consisted of cheating husbands and wives. She just wanted something more. So, when the chance work on case hunting down a criminal for the sexy cowboy, Eric Water, she was more than willing.Emma was more than surprised when the cowboy she was going to work for ended up being the same man she had met at a strip club the weekend before. The instant connection she felt that past weekend was still there. Could she work with this man?Eric and Emma fall hard for each other. But with so many secrets that Eric is keeping can this relationship work? If Emma found out why she is working on this job and how, he would lose her for sure.This is a definite 5 star read for me.DOUBLE CROSSED: Double Crossed is probably my favorite book so far in the Crossed series and I love them all! This is Annabelle Waters and Derek Fields story. This book really ties all the stories together. There's so much chemistry between Annabelle and Derek that it is coming off the pages.Annabelle has made mistakes in her past and is keeping secrets. The secrets that have cost her dearly. She didn't know that a man could bring out feelings like she feels when she's around Derek. Derek can tell she's been hurt and wants to do everything in his power to take it away. But that's not as easy as it may seem. Derek too has a secret that he hasn't told anyone. Can these two share their secrets and find trust and healing?You will not be able to put this book down. There's so much going on and many unexpected and emotional twists and turns. Get tissues ready because you will most definitely need them! I can't wait for Crossed Off, the final book in the series.CROSSED OFF: Crossed Off is the final book in the Crossed series. I absolutely love this series and Crossed Off was no exception. This book was just perfect. Lacey gave us drama, suspense, and hotter than hell sex and wrapped it up with a perfect HEA. I was anxious, happy, sad and scared at different times in Crossed  Off.If you've read the series, you will know it was quite the transformation from country Skyler to the city Skyler. Skyler is hiding out in the city from her evil half brother who wants to kill her to avenge his twin brothers death. Skyler has been working under an alias in an illegal money laundering operation. While on the job she met Harry, who really happens to be Cash Wagner, her bosses son.Cash is working to stop his father's illegal dealings and clean up the Wagner family name. He tricked Sky on the job and got her fired. Let's just say that it ends up working well for her. Cash is absolutely swoon worthy and protective. He falls for Sky and can't get enough of her.Both Sky and Cash have pasts that are painful and they are hiding secrets about themselves. Can they open their hearts and heal each other? Together they work to end the last illegal Wagner operation. This job ends up being more than they bargained for and Sky is in for the fight of her life.I highly recommend this book. You should read the other books in this series first.

Hats off to Kassidy Blake for the wonderful conclusion to Lillian and Wesson's story. As with book one, Who I Was, I was on the edge of my seat wondering what twists and turns we're going to happen.  Fate had so much in store for everyone. You will never see the twist that is coming. I loved all the characters in this book and hope to get more from everyone!

Who I Was kept me on the edge of my seat. Imagine seeing your parents killed when you were just a child and being shot yourself. Lillian and her brother Parker have been in witness protection and hiding from the evil man that killed their parents. They are on the run again as he is closer to finding them. While in a safe house they are attacked and Parker is taken. Lillian is left in the care of agent Braxton, Parker's best friend. Braxton and another agent are there to protect her. Both men have feelings for her and things get heated. Lillian's trust is shattered and when all she thought she knew isn't as it seems. This book is full of drama, suspense, hot sex and danger. It ends in one heck of a cliffhanger!

I am sad that the Jonathan and Monica's story is over, but what a way for it to end! I laughed, cried and swooned!! Jonathan and Monica's love story is one I'll never forget!  Hats off and standing O for CD Reiss!

His Proposed Deal is another fantastic book by Sandi Lynn. This book has it all! HOT rich playboy (Max), beautiful girl pursuing her dreams (Emma), instant attraction, hot sex, pain, heartbreak, love and devotion. All would be well and good, but love and unexpected surprises were never supposed to be part of the deal. Sandi Lynn does an amazing job bringing this story together and making you both love and hate Max. This book has both panty melting sex and deep emotional loving moments that will make you swoon. Once I started this book, I couldn't put it down. His Proposed Deal is a 5 star read for me!

Tempting BAD was‚Ä¶ Wow, just wow! I can't begin to tell you how much I loved this book. This story will literally rip your heart out, stomp on it, start to heal it, and then rip it out again, only to put it back together better than it's ever been. If you want emotion you've got it. If you want hot as hell sex, then you've most definitely got it. If you want to see two broken halves become whole, then jump in and devour this book. It is not a hearts and flowers love story, it is just more! Hats off to M. Robinson for such a wonderful story. This is a definite five star read for me!!

Rescue Me is book 2 in the Shelter Me Series.  I can't tell you how much I loved this book.  This book reached in and squeezed my heart and did not let go.  Rescue Me is a story about a woman who survived being battered and abused both physically and mentally by her ex-husband.  He has torn her self worth to nothing.  Erin found the strength to leave, to save her daughter Sierra, but she has a hard time finding the strength to love herself.  That is until Adam is able to reach in and tear down the walls and show her how much she is worth.  Adam is completely swoon worthy and will melt your heart.  His is the total opposite of the evil that is her ex. He not only loves Erin, but he loves and adores Sierra as well.  So much happens in this book that you will not be able to put it down.  Erin's past comes back and she is in for the fight of her life, and fight she does! This is a 5 star must read!!

This was my first book by Devon Hartford and it won't be my last. Stepbrother Obsessed was sexy, funny and emotional. This book touched on many subjects not just the "taboo" stepbrother/stepsister relationship but also bullying, reducing your carbon footprint and acceptance of others as they are and not how they look. I fell for Dante in spite of his cocky self assured attitude. I love that Skye wasn't this perfect beauty queen, but was perfect in Dante's eyes. Their relationship is a constant uphill battle that is not easy. I was frustrated at times, but it made me want to read even more. I hope to read more about Skye and Dante in the future.

I absolutely loved this book.  I was immediately pulled in to the story and could feel the weight of the past and pain that Kayla keeps buried inside. Even after leaving New York and running for almost 5 years, she can't run from the past that haunts her. She begins to feel again when she meets a hot British guy at a club.  Kayla went out to the club to forget that tragic day and he was just the ticket to helping her forget. Only he too had something that weighed heavy on his heart.I love the journey that HM Ward and Stacey Mosteller take us on of learning to trust, heal and love again.  This was such a beautiful love story that will have you laughing and crying, but it is so worth it! I did not want to put this book down.  I could read about Oliver, our Hot British guy, and Kayla his American girl all day long.I highly recommend this book.  It is a definite five star read for me.

This is a great deal for so many amazing books!! I read My First, My Last by Lacey Silks and it blew me away! It was more than worth the price of the entire collection. Here is my review of My First, My Last.This is a beautiful story about two people who are destined to be together even after being apart for 20 years. Mia and Adrian were each others first loves when they were only 15 years old. They met at her aunts when she visited Vienna from Canada in the summers. They were separated by distance yet never completely got over the other.Mia was stunned when she was out with friends and saw him at the bar in Canada. He was gorgeous and took her breath away. After 20 years he still caused feelings to stir inside her.Mia is divorced with two children. She still has a friendly relationship with her ex husband, Dan, for the sake of the children. This makes it difficult for her to let go and not feel guilty for her feelings for Adrain, even tho Dan is the one who cheated on her. Mia feels like she was a failure at marriage and doesn't want to fail again.Adrain has never married because no one could compare to his love for Mia. He is still madly in love with her and will stop at nothing to show her how worthy she is.This book is so full of love and emotions. I laughed and cried like a baby. This book was well worth all the tears. It will make you believe in destiny and sole mates.

Secrets, lies, love and betrayal!! That is what you get in Disillusioned. Nothing is as it seems and Bianca doesn't know what to believe or who she can trust. I was on the edge of my seat throughout this entire book. Just when you think you may have everything figured out.....BAM another WTH moment happens and you are once again piecing everything together. It was a jaw dropping cliffhanger and I can't wait to find out the rest of the story in Resolution!

This topic has always been fascinating to me. People say so much more then they realize without speaking a word but just through their body language. Many of us personally dont realize that we ourselves say so much more to others by the way they read our body language when our words may not  even be spoken. This book gave me better insight as to what the signs mean and how to read futher into a persons by their body language. I think it was also interesting how these body language cues mean different things in different cultures. After reading this book it helped me get a better understanding for myself on how I send off different signs just by the use of my body language that I didnt realize.
